column5: How do I reduce the size of pics I want to upload? I can never seem to do it.  Thanks, in adavance

there are many ways to do it one of the easiest ways is with one of the hundreds of free programs to do just that  http://dw.com.com/redir?edId=3&siteId=4&oId=3000-2192_4-10319476&ontId=2192_4&spi=83cf1daf47a4049a20c0d3b9d710f939&lop=link&tag=tdw_dltext&ltype=dl_dlnow&pid=11893806&mfgId=6245321&merId=6245321&pguid=b@SeYAoOYI0AAFrtFdkAAADb&destUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fdownload.cnet.com%2F3001-2192_4-10319476.html%3Fspi%3D83cf1daf47a4049a20c0d3b9d710f939

Another way where where you don't need software is to load them to photobucket.  You will need a free account.  You can resize them there quite easily, copy the IMG code and paste it right into a report here.
